product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nova Stretch Visor - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a special cooling lining fabric and a wide brim, the Mountain Hardwear Nova Stretch Visor keeps you comfortable and shaded from the sun when you're out for a run. Cool.Q(TM) ZERO lining at the forehead has sweat-activated cooling polymers embedded in the fabric that help lower the fabric's temperature. Wide brim shades your face from the sun. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Stretch fit is designed to fit comfortably around most head sizes. Closeout.
short_description: With a special cooling lining fabric and a wide brim, the Mountain Hardwear Nova Stretch Visor keeps you comfortable and shaded from the sun when you're out for a run.
